steps.title: Navigate to the Reddit homepage using your preferred browser.
steps.content: Navigate to the Reddit homepage using your preferred browser. There you will be greeted with a welcoming message, as well as the most popular posts in your area.

steps.title: Know how to view individual posts.
steps.content: Know how to view individual posts. To view individual posts, click the title of the post. Depending on the content of the post, you will either be taken to a different site/article the post is linking to or you'll be directed to the post-page on the subreddit the post was submitted to, where you can read the text post or view the image post. On the post-page, you can read comments, and once you've created your account, you can upvote (like), downvote, and reply other people's comments or write your own comments on the post.

steps.title: Understand what a subreddit is.
steps.content: Understand what a subreddit is. A subreddit is a forum dedicated to a specific topic where you can post links, create posts or discuss other people's posts. Once you've created your Reddit account, you can subscribe to specific subreddits if you like their topics, or you can unsubscribe if you don't. Subreddits always start with r/[SUBREDDITNAME]

steps.title: Create an account
steps.content: Create an account . Click on sign up and follow the steps presented to you. Insert your email address. Subscribe to the recommended subreddits that interest you. (Don't worry, you'll be able to subscribe to other subreddits later.) Choose your username and password. For your username, pick something fun that you won't regret, as you won't be able to change it later. As for your password, it's recommended to be at least 16 characters long and include both uppercase and lowercase letters, as well as numbers and symbols. Check the "I'm not a robot" box.

steps.title: Create a post
steps.content: Create a post . Go to the home page. Click on Submit a new link or Submit a new text post , depending on the content of your post. Enter your title, insert the content of the post and select a place (subreddit) to post to. Check the "I'm not a robot" box. Click Submit and you're finished.

steps.title: Download the official Reddit app on the App Store or Play Store.
steps.content: Download the official Reddit app on the App Store or Play Store.

steps.title: Create your account or log in to an already existing account.
steps.content: Create your account or log in to an already existing account.

steps.title: Create an account.
steps.content: Create an account. Type your email, username, and password. Tap on Create account .

steps.title: Tap on Create post and pick the type of post you'd like to submit.
steps.content: Tap on Create post and pick the type of post you'd like to submit. They are listed below. LINK IMAGE VIDEO TEXT

steps.title: Pick a community, write your title, and insert your content into the post.
steps.content: Pick a community, write your title, and insert your content into the post. Tap the post button and you're finished.

steps.title: Know how to browse.
steps.content: Know how to browse. Browsing Reddit on mobile is relatively simple compared to using it on a desktop/laptop. You simply tap the title to view articles/text posts, tap the image to view an image and tap the comment icon to read/write comments. You can also tap the upvote/downvote arrows to indicate whether you like a post or not.
